001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client;
003
004import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
005import java.util.Optional;
006
007import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.EqualsBuilder;
008import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.HashCodeBuilder;
009import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringBuilder;
010
011public class ApiHttpResponse<U> extends Base {
012
013    private int statusCode;
014    private ApiHttpHeaders headers;
015    private U body;
016    private String message;
017
018    public ApiHttpResponse(final int statusCode, final ApiHttpHeaders headers, final U body) {
019        this(statusCode, headers, body, null);
020    }
021
022    public ApiHttpResponse(final int statusCode, final ApiHttpHeaders headers, final U body, final String message) {
023        this.statusCode = statusCode;
024        this.headers = Optional.ofNullable(headers).orElse(new ApiHttpHeaders());
025        this.body = body;
026        this.message = message;
027    }
028
029    public ApiHttpResponse(final ApiHttpResponse<U> response) {
030        this.statusCode = response.statusCode;
031        this.headers = response.headers;
032        this.body = response.body;
033        this.message = response.message;
034    }
035
036    public int getStatusCode() {
037        return statusCode;
038    }
039
040    public ApiHttpResponse<U> withStatusCode(final int statusCode) {
041        ApiHttpResponse<U> response = copy();
042        response.statusCode = statusCode;
043
044        return response;
045    }
046
047    public ApiHttpHeaders getHeaders() {
048        return headers;
049    }
050
051    public ApiHttpResponse<U> withHeaders(final ApiHttpHeaders headers) {
052        ApiHttpResponse<U> response = copy();
053        response.headers = headers;
054
055        return response;
056    }
057
058    public U getBody() {
059        return body;
060    }
061
062    public ApiHttpResponse<U> withBody(final U body) {
063        ApiHttpResponse<U> response = copy();
064        response.body = body;
065
066        return response;
067    }
068
069    public String getMessage() {
070        return message;
071    }
072
073    public ApiHttpResponse<U> withMessage(final String message) {
074        ApiHttpResponse<U> response = copy();
075        response.message = message;
076
077        return response;
078    }
079
080    @Override
081    public String toString() {
082        return new ToStringBuilder(this).append("statusCode", statusCode)
083                .append("headers", headers)
084                .append("textInterpretedBody", getSecuredBody())
085                .toString();
086    }
087
088    static String tryToFilter(final String input) {
089        return input.replaceAll("(\"\\w*([Pp]ass|access_token|refresh_token)\\w*\"):\"[^\"]*\"",
090            "$1:\"**removed from output**\"");
091    }
092
093    public Optional<String> getBodyAsString() {
094        if (body instanceof byte[]) {
095            return Optional.of(body).map(b -> tryToFilter(new String((byte[]) b, StandardCharsets.UTF_8)));
096        }
097        else {
098            return Optional.ofNullable(body).map(Object::toString);
099        }
100    }
101
102    public String getSecuredBody() {
103        return getBodyAsString().orElse("empty body");
104    }
105
106    private ApiHttpResponse<U> copy() {
107        return new ApiHttpResponse<>(this);
108    }
109
110    @Override
111    public boolean equals(Object o) {
112        if (this == o)
113            return true;
114
115        if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass())
116            return false;
117
118        ApiHttpResponse<?> response = (ApiHttpResponse<?>) o;
119
120        return new EqualsBuilder().append(statusCode, response.statusCode)
121                .append(headers, response.headers)
122                .append(body, response.body)
123                .append(message, response.message)
124                .isEquals();
125    }
126
127    @Override
128    public int hashCode() {
129        return new HashCodeBuilder(17, 37).append(statusCode).append(headers).append(body).append(message).toHashCode();
130    }
131}
